remarks: The variables in a subring polynomial algebra are the same as the original ring.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jul-2015.)
statement:
subrgmvr.v $e |- V = ( I mVar R ) $.
subrgmvr.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
subrgmvr.r $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) $.
subrgmvr.h $e |- H = ( R |`s T ) $.
subrgmvr $p |- ( ph -> V = ( I mVar H ) ) $.
